title: What is it that Riven, Wukong and Syndra can't do that these new assasssins can?
body: Because all I'm seeing between the 3 of them is the same amount of assassin potential as these newer types of "Less bursty assassins" equipped with more utility, and a much less risky play style.

replies.body:
{{champion:134}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:62}} 

ARE NOT ASSASSINS

> [{quoted}](name=Wimbledofy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ghzBAEFO,comment-id=000100000003,timestamp=2016-11-04T02:37:13.777+0000)

My point is he isn't an assassin because he outdoes all the assassins.

by definition. they are not. but all of them. do what basically. an assassin is supposed to do. which is kill you in about a second or so.  which these champions can do. and a lot more. and assassins. don't do a whole lot more than killing a single target.
Stop putting random commas whenever you post stuff god damn it. It makes it so hard to read what you've typed.

> [{quoted}](name=MrFawknSunshine ,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ghzBAEFO,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-03T23:34:08.258+0000)
>
> {{champion:134}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:62}} 
> 
> ARE NOT ASSASSINS

I laughed
and why is that ?

RIven has no way to actually get instantly into your backline outside of flashing (unlike actual assassins), yes she has a lot of mobility but its not instant/long range mobility, her mobility adds up with time and she cannot just ignore frontline so she has to fight her way through, and thats why shes a skirmisher.

Syndra has 0 mobility outside of summoners, even though she is broken as fk right now.

Wukong doesnt really have 100-0 burst if not building glass/being ahead, hes just a tanky initiator/diver most of the time.

Just because someone has high burst damage doesnt mean they are an assassin, assassins have that AND mobility/tools to slip past/ignore the frontline (like stealth and/or high range blinks/dashes), kill the target and possibly get away alive (or kill everyone else).

WOW Stop it, you're actually making sense. Go diamondsplain somewhere else and let the NA boards balance specialists have their circle jerk, no kudos for you!

Riven is like Zac, always able to get to the backline with her broken QQQ combo, then she just press R and AoE assassinate 5 people GG
Syndra is not mobile. At all.

{{champion:91}} Parkour.
{{champion:7}} Force flashes.
{{champion:107}} Instacrit for a crapload.
{{champion:35}} explode into boxes.
{{champion:84}} Be hot.
{{champion:55}} Spin2Win Feat. Blades
{{champion:121}} 1v1 anybody.
#PARKOUR
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ync7ufl56Z0/maxresdefault.jpg
https://media4.giphy.com/media/xT5LMpqDOIFWS9o6bK/200.gif#12

Syndra does too much damage, its true, but what separates her from an assassin is mobility and disengage tools. If you get on top of her she's fucked.

Riven can't really "poof" into the backline of your team like an assassin can but she does have a lot of mobility. She can really only assassinate targets when she gets into a good flanking position or catches somebody out of position because she can't really bulldoze though the front line very well.

Wukong, tbh, pretty much has an assassin kit, or something very close to it.

You do know that thing is on  a long af cd right? And another thing, it doesn't start behind her like Yasuo wall, so {{champion:55}} and {{champion:91}}  are difficult to handle with Syndra to say the least.
Most gap closers are generally speaking on an equal to slightly shorter cooldown, new Kat obviously being an exception. But if they get close there's always that legendary R click.
*WHOOOOSH*

Well if you want a breakdown.....

{{champion:134}} - completely immobile but is ranged. Worth?

{{champion:62}} - targeted mobility which means he can go in, but not go out. Feast or famine.....strong when ahead, but worthless when behind

{{champion:92}} - Good question. Super mobile assasin-ish playstyle thatis only kept in balnce with numbers checks
Wukong does have potential but idk m8
I wish they would make Wukong an assassin. Right now I don't really know what the guy is other than an ult bot...
Wukong is a Divers. He can go in back line and  no care of ennemy... His ult is team fight style, not assassination style.
Diver.
None of them are hot like Akali is

Praise be 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
Mobility the others carry in spades
The new assassins aren't supposed to be less risky or have more utility I think you completely missed the point of the class update

What? You literally just said the point I made, they don't have more utility or less risk. My point is if their burst is taking a hit by being more spread out damage then I don't see viability, that was the only factor they had over those 3 champions.
The answer to your question is mobility
